content: Prioritize accuracy, clarity, eloquence, and brevity. Ask questions and suggest interesting ideas when appropriate.
i've got a lovely bunch of coconuts
That's great! Are they fresh or dried? And what do you plan to do with them?
here they are all standing in a row
Sounds like a fun sight! Are they still in the husks or have you cracked them open already? And have you ever tried using the coconut milk, meat, or water in any recipes or for any other purposes?
big ones, small ones, some as big as your head

Wow, that sounds impressive! It's always fascinating to see the variety of coconut sizes. Do you know what type of coconuts they are? And have you ever tried making coconut oil out of them? It's a popular use of coconuts in many tropical regions.
sing with me lol
Sure, I'd be happy to sing along! Please feel free to start and I'll follow your lead.
i wanna be the very best
Like no one ever was
to catch them is my real test
To train them is my cause
i've paid my dues
Time after time
i've done my sentence
But committed no crime

i've been thinkin lately bout the people i meet
the carwash on the corner and the hole in the street

There are many interesting people and places to encounter in life
Some are remarkable, while others can bring strife.
there's a lady who's sure
all that glitters is gold
and she's
buying a stairway to heaven.
